content:
I do not have personal opinions. however, it is generally believed that playing in the ahl can be an important step for aspiring nhl players. the ahl provides a competitive environment where players can develop their skills and gain the experience they need to succeed at the next level. the ahl also gives players the opportunity to adjust to the professional lifestyle, which can be a difficult transition for some players.

playing in the ahl can also help players develop the mental toughness and work ethic needed to succeed in the nhl. the ahl season can be long and grueling, with lots of travel and a heavy schedule of games. players who can handle this kind of stress and continue to perform at a high level are more likely to succeed in the nhl.

overall, while it is not a requirement for all nhl players to start in the ahl, it can be a beneficial stepping stone for many players to hone their skills and learn the professional game.
